text: Timothy Richard Heidecker (; born February 3, 1976) is an American comedian, writer, director, actor, and musician. He is best known as one half of the comedy duo Tim & Eric, along with Eric Wareheim. They are known for creating the television shows Tom Goes to the Mayor, Tim and Eric Awesome Show, Great Job!, and Tim & Eric's Bedtime Stories. Heidecker was born and raised in Allentown, Pennsylvania. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American voice actors Category:American television actors Category:American television directors Category:American television writers Category:American television producers Category:Actors from Allentown, Pennsylvania Category:Musicians from Pennsylvania Category:Comedians from Pennsylvania Category:Writers from Pennsylvania
title: Tim Heidecker
